sentences.en: ...a cost-cutting programme to reallocate people and resources within the company.
sentences.cn: …在公司内部重新分配人员和资源的节省开支计划。

sentences.en: Thus, there is no need to reallocate the container for each new element.
sentences.cn: 于是, 不必为每个新元素重新分配容器.

sentences.en: You can also use Attribute Refunds to reallocate your attribute points at any time.
sentences.cn: 您可以利用特技重置来随时重新分配您的特技点.

trans.tran_en: When organizations reallocate money or resources, they decide to change the way they spend the money or use the resources
When organizations reallocate money or resources, they decide to change the way they spend the money or use the resources
